questions.question: Considering the overall visual presentation, what is the dominant color scheme of the product's packaging, as directly observable?

Judging solely from the image, what secondary ingredient is highlighted, apart from peanuts, on the product label?
What textural quality is conveyed by the image of the packaging material itself?
Examining the image, what shape is the overall packaging in which the product is contained?
What is the observable form or style of the text that communicates the product's ingredients?
What is the material implied by the visual appearance of the package on which the ingredients are printed?
What type of visual formatting is used to demarcate the 'Ingredients' from the 'Contains' section?
Disregarding any text, what is the general texture of the product visible through the packaging (if any)?
